jumpInfo: Press UP to jump. Though you might have already known that.
pipeInfo: Press SPACE to move through the pipes and make your way to the end.
pipeInfo2: Some pipes need to be activated by a switch first to use.
switchInfo: Press SPACE to activate switches to help progress through the water station.
timerInfo: Youre on a timer so try to beat this level as fast as you can! I should have said that sooner? Oops.
